bioghist.head: Historical Note
bioghist.p: George Ashman Hamill was a physician from Bedford, Pennsylvania; his brother was William Cromwell Hamill (1821-1843), a businessman of Blairsville, Pennsylvania. They were sons of William Hamill, a physician, and his third wife, Rebecca Ashman Hamill. George Ashman Hamill lived in Bedford, Pa., from 1843-1846, and then settled in Martinsburg, Virginia. J. Q. A. Nadenbousch was an administrator for the Hamill estate in 1871.
